name: Check box
description: This is a short demo of a game I  am working. The game is a minanalistic puzzel game where you control a simple rolling box. This demo only uses a few if the feture and only has 20 level (as compared to the finished on which will have ~155 levels).  "IMPORTANT, I'm sorry but after the last level I messed up and it does not cut to an end screen but if you got to level 20 you will know when you have completed it just don't get mad, sorry".
